name: Crime Squad: Train Shooter
description:
Get ready to driving crime squad train is astonishing especially when it arises to fast train driving for transference 2K18 responsibility. The city bullet train is fortified with modern lethal weapon where you will go down rival attack as city crime squad train shooter. Be the real truck vehicle driver and be police bullet train gun shooter and use bullet train to combat against enemy who would attack on the Special Forces. The police officers are all ready to get training on next station. You need to get-up-and-go carefully from hazardous zone and transport and cargo opportune to offroad train station.

For all those admirers of train driving simulator games this is a new adventure with train shooter and future contests.

Features:

• Exciting Goods transport 2018
• Excellent crime squad train shooter
• Electrifying bullet train shooter missions
• Conveyance police officer and load timely
• Gunshot train driving in city and off-road rail paths
• High quality visuals and attractive sound things

Download and relish your mood with the unique gameplay of train shooter and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
